question: [File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/gen_replay_verify_jobs.rs] [Struct: Opt] [Thread Safety] Can concurrent_downloads parameter at line 60 exceed system limits, causing connection exhaustion or download failures during metadata sync? (Medium)
